column2: One more tweak to the Power-up.
Sure
Let's go to Lightspeed again.
For the final touch, let's add another possible random upgrade to the ship. Go to the code.

Go to the `activatePowerup()` function on the Power-Up tab. We will give one of 3 upgrades, so the random number should be between 1 and 3.

Then we'll use `ship.engineTimer = 5;` to make the new third upgrade work!  I'm ready to give you hints.
Change `var r = random(1,2);` to `var r = random(1,3);`
Then below `ship.attractTimer = 5;`, add a new line that says `if (r == 3)`
Then after that add `ship.engineTimer = 5;`
So the whole thing will say `if (r == 3) ship.engineTimer = 5;`  Then flip back around to test!
Go ahead and try the level as usual.
You should be able to get all 3 types of upgrades as you play the level...
Press *Restart.*
Let's try that level again!
Press *Restart.*
You didn't get all 3 types of upgrades. Weird. See what's going on with that code.
That Power-up didn't give any upgrade to the ship. Go back and see if an upgrade is specified.
Did you mean to pick a Power-up of a different type?
No Power-up? Every tiny thing matters in code! Check to make sure they're actually being spawned.
Perfect. Now you just need to breeze to the end of the level.
Excellent! You have completed all Power-ups. Now we're ready for the final challenge to get the fob.
Check back whenever you're ready!
